column4: Someone please tell me the command to run the remote desktop config gui thingy?
It's not showing up in xfce but Im running regular ubuntu
so just the command to run the config for the remote desktop
for example can someone go into the menu editor and see what the command is for the remote dekstop
i think you can right click and see properties
no i want the gui config thing - like in system preferences
at the command line, you can run 'apropos remote desktop'
hmm, maybe they took it out of the menu when they made it a toolbar widget
ah its not in there- can you just look in the menu for me ?
